original_text: As a servant earnestly desireth the shadow, and as an hireling looketh for the reward of his work:
korean_text: 종은 저녁 그늘을 몹시 바라고 품꾼은 그의 삯을 기다리나니

sentences.original_text: As a servant earnestly desireth the shadow
and as an hireling looketh for the reward of his work
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 품꾼이 자기 일의 보수를 기다리듯이
